backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing marketplace logic for user profiles, seller profiles, listings, access control, and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing requirements for a custom domain input/validation flow and listing the files implementing it.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/.env: Environment configuration specifying Google verification token and the current VITE_PUBLIC_URL value.
frontend/.env.example: Template env file showing how to configure Google verification and VITE_PUBLIC_URL for deployments.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template containing meta tags, SEO placeholders, JSON‑LD schema, and a runtime fallback for public URLs.
frontend/public/googleb1147599673a3710.h: Google site verification HTML file served statically for search console validation.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots configuration allowing all crawlers and pointing to the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing homepage, publishing page, and profile page with default localhost URLs.
frontend/public/static-html-example.html: Standalone static HTML example page demonstrating how static files can be served from /public.
frontend/scripts/generate-sitemap.mjs: Node script that generates sitemap.xml using VITE_PUBLIC_URL or localhost as the base URL.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main app router, routes, theme provider, and global layout/toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity with state handling and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandHe: Displays the brand logo and mascot with simple layout and animation.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Shows a generic empty-state message with optional action button.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSt: Displays a centered loading spinner and message.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the app’s layout including header, navigation, footer, and background pattern.
frontend/src/components/listings/Categor: Renders category filter buttons and notifies parent when a category is selected.
frontend/src/components/listings/ImageUp: Handles up to three image uploads as data URLs with preview and remove functionality.
frontend/src/components/listings/Listing: Displays a listing preview card with image, title, price, and quantity.
Form for creating or editing listings with presets, validation, and image upload support.
Shows a grid of listing cards with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/listings/listing: Defines preset listing templates with predefined fields for quick form filling.
frontend/src/components/sellers/SellerDi: Fetches and displays a seller’s display name or a fallback while loading.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useCreateLi: Mutation hook for creating listings and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useCreateSe: Mutation hook for creating a seller profile and refreshing seller-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useDeactiva: Mutation hook to deactivate a listing and refresh listing queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useSaveUser: Mutation hook to save a user profile and refresh the current user profile query.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useUpdateLi: Mutation hook to update a listing and invalidate related listing queries.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Fetches the current user's profile using the actor and exposes loading state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useIsSeller.t: Returns whether the authenticated user is a seller by calling actor.isSeller().
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useListingDet: Fetches a specific listing by ID when an actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useListings.t: Loads all listings by fetching all sellers and flattening their listings.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useMyListings: Fetches listings belonging to the authenticated user's principal.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useSellers.ts: Fetches a seller's profile by principal and returns null on error.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and client setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays hero, search, filters, and a grid of all listings with client-side filtering.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetailPage.tsx: Shows listing details with images, seller info, share options, and owner actions like deactivation.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Manages user profile setup and displays the user's listings, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PublishingSharePage.t: UI page for sharing deployment URLs, custom domain validation, and copying environment snippets.
frontend/src/pages/SellCreateListingPage: Page for authenticated users to create new listings using a ListingForm and mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/SellEditListingPage.t: Page allowing listing owners to load, edit, and update an existing listing with validation checks.
frontend/src/utils/canisterErrors.ts: Parses raw canister errors and maps them to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/customDomain.ts: Validates custom domains, generates env snippets, and persists domain input in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/publicUrl.ts: Retrieves the app’s public URL from env or window origin and exposes deployment URL.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, fonts, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for improving custom domain onboarding, including existing features, pending requests, and known domain‑validation issues. Contains metadata like schema version, project info, and configuration notes.
